items.title: What it is :
items.subtitle: An award-winning invisible makeup primer with a 94% natural gel formula that smooths skin, grips makeup up to 12 hours, and locks in hydrationaward-winning invisible makeup primeaward-winning invisible makeup primeaward-winning invisible makeup prime.

items.title: Finish:
items.subtitle: Radiant

items.title: Highlighted Ingredients:
notes: Blue Agave Extract: Helps form an invisible layer to lock in makeup.
Hyaluronic Acid and Hemp-Derived Cannabis Seed Extract: Boost hydration to visibly smooth skin.

items.title: Expiry date :
items.subtitle: 15th May, 2023
